content.question: Which of the following is a key philosophical and religious element of Daoism?

choices.label: Respect for one's ancestors as critical to proper behavior
Belief in the Mandate of Heaven
Emphasis on harmony between humanity and nature
Precedence of duty to one’s family over all other obligations

content.answer: Emphasis on harmony between humanity and nature

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
